text: This article lists the prime ministers of Rwanda since the formation of the post in 1961 to the present day. A total of 11 people have served in the office. The incumbent prime minister is Édouard Ngirente, who took office on 30 August 2017. ==List== ===Rwanda=== # Name Term of office 1 Ndahiro Mimi 1350 - 1386 2 Ndoba 1386 - 1410 3 Samembe 1410 - 1434 4 Nsoro 1434 —1458 5 Ruganzu I 1458 -
